text: <@U0UHG4VP1> how is the description etc set? Is that manual or is it part of what we push when we update?
also, <@U11HH3P7Y> can I get a sense of where we think we are with Jenkins x86?
because it seems to fail randomly with a similar docker error (cannot connect to non-running container)
is this likely a timing issue?
although, TBH I have also seen failures in the unit tests and unclear that they were related to the PR
Hi Chris Good morning.. I am analyzing these behave failures. I think these are related to Jenkins x86 docker environment,, Will check and let you know
Most of the recent unit-test failures are related to the PR's
ok, I am pulling together a proposal(s) that I’ll add as a markdown file to the fabric repo
basically, should have a brief description and then usage
Great. Let me know when it's in and I'll copy/paste
